short_summary: Procurement of N7A2 spares (details below) for ERMs 6975 and 69766 at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CBF Esquimalt, British Columbia
full_summary:
### [Government Tender Announcement](#government-tender-announcement)

#### Tender Details

*   **Procurement Reference Number**: PW-22-01005075
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230524/A
*   **Publication Date**: August 23, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: September 23, 2022, at 2:00 PM ET
*   **Timeline**: The contract is expected to start on an undisclosed date and end on an undisclosed date.

#### Procurement Details

*   **Skeywords**: Torque Converters and Speed Changers, Gears, Pulleys, Sprockets and Transmission Chain, Chain and Wire Rope, Fittings for Rope, Cable and Chain, Power and Hand Pumps, Switches
*   **Supply Description**: The Department of National Defence requires the procurement of various components, including pumps, wire rope assemblies, sprocket wheels, gear assemblies, and switch assemblies. These components are to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
*   **Bid Conditions**: Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will not be considered. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   **Language of Documents**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority**: Department of National Defence
*   **Contact Person**: Jason Mainguy, [jason.mainguy@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jason.mainguy@forces.gc.ca), 819-939-3668, 455, boulevard de la carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6R5

#### Trade Agreements

*   This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA
